title: OptOut Additional Details
description: Describes user communication preferences by channel. For each channel individually, which is a property of this object, a user's preference such as opt-in, opt-out, or pending can be recorded. In addition, a global override opt-out is possible. Each property of this schema must be a valid and known URI for an XDM Channel.

xdm:optOutReason.title: Opt Out Reason
xdm:optOutReason.description: Reason for opting out for a notification.

xdm:optOutDate.title: Opt Out Date
xdm:optOutDate.description: Date of opting out for a notification.
